00005 static void
00006 decode_bro_port (U8 in_port, U8 * out_port)
00007 {
00008     switch (in_port) {
00009         case MOTOR_A:
00010             *out_port = NXT_PORT_A;
00011             break;
00012         case MOTOR_B:
00013             *out_port = NXT_PORT_B;
00014             break;
00015         case MOTOR_C:
00016             *out_port = NXT_PORT_C;
00017             break;
00018         
00019         case PORT_1:
00020             *out_port = NXT_PORT_S1;
00021             break;
00022         case PORT_2:
00023             *out_port = NXT_PORT_S2;
00024             break;
00025         case PORT_3:
00026             *out_port = NXT_PORT_S3;
00027             break;
00028         case PORT_4:
00029             *out_port = NXT_PORT_S4;
00030             break;
00031         default:    //  Only for future upgrades
00032             break;
00033     };
00034 }
00035 
00036 //  :3 Listen, here we will write the function that will decode only ONE order and will return some data, IF it's a sensors packet...
00037 static void
00038 decode_bro_input (const bro_fist_t * input_packet, bro_fist_t * output_packet, engines_t * motors )
00039 {
00040     U8 temp_port;
00041     
00042     output_packet->port = input_packet->port;
00043     output_packet->operation = input_packet->operation;
00044     
00045     switch (input_packet->operation) {
00046         case LIGHT_SENSOR:
00047             decode_bro_port (input_packet->port, &temp_port);
00048             output_packet->data = (float) ecrobot_get_light_sensor(temp_port);
00049             break;
00050             
00051         case TOUCH_SENSOR:
00052             decode_bro_port (input_packet->port, &temp_port);
00053             output_packet->data = (float) ecrobot_get_touch_sensor(temp_port);
00054             break;
00055             
00056         case SOUND_SENSOR:
00057             decode_bro_port (input_packet->port, &temp_port);
00058             output_packet->data = (float) ecrobot_get_sound_sensor(temp_port);
00059             break;
00060             
00061         case RADAR_SENSOR:
00062             decode_bro_port (input_packet->port, &temp_port);
00063             output_packet->data = (float) ecrobot_get_sonar_sensor(temp_port);
00064             break;
00065             
00066         case TACHO_COUNT:
00067             decode_bro_port (input_packet->port, &temp_port);
00068             output_packet->data = (float) nxt_motor_get_count(temp_port);
00069             break;
00070             
00071         case AVG_SPEED:
00072             decode_bro_port (input_packet->port, &temp_port);
00073             switch (temp_port) {
00074                 case NXT_PORT_A:
00075                     output_packet->data = avg(&motors->first);
00076                 break;
00077                 
00078                 case NXT_PORT_B:
00079                     output_packet->data = avg(&motors->second);
00080                 break;
00081                 
00082                 case NXT_PORT_C:
00083                     output_packet->data = avg(&motors->third);
00084                 break;
00085             };
00086             break;
00087             
00088         case SET_SPEED:
00089             decode_bro_port (input_packet->port, &temp_port);
00090             switch (temp_port) {
00091                 case NXT_PORT_A:
00092                     motors->first.speed_control_type = PID_CONTROLLED;
00093                     motors->first.speed_ref = input_packet->data;
00094                 break;
00095                 
00096                 case NXT_PORT_B:
00097                     motors->second.speed_control_type = PID_CONTROLLED;
00098                     motors->second.speed_ref = input_packet->data;
00099                 break;
00100                 
00101                 case NXT_PORT_C:
00102                     motors->third.speed_control_type = PID_CONTROLLED;
00103                     motors->third.speed_ref = input_packet->data;
00104                 break;
00105             };
00106             break;
00107             
00108        case SET_POWER:
00109             decode_bro_port (input_packet->port, &temp_port);
00110             switch (temp_port) {
00111                 case NXT_PORT_A:
00112                     motors->first.speed_control_type = RAW_POWER;
00113                     motors->first.powers[0] = input_packet->data;
00114                 break;
00115                 
00116                 case NXT_PORT_B:
00117                     motors->second.speed_control_type = RAW_POWER;
00118                     motors->second.powers[0] = input_packet->data;
00119                 break;
00120                 
00121                 case NXT_PORT_C:
00122                     motors->third.speed_control_type = RAW_POWER;
00123                     motors->third.powers[0] = input_packet->data;
00124                 break;
00125             };
00126             break;
00127         
00128     };
00129 }

00132 //  Function to decode a LIST of FISTS and do things accordingly... :3 
00133 void decode_bro_fists (const bro_fist_t * orders, bro_fist_t * response, engines_t * motors)
00134 {
00135     int i;
00136     
00137     for (i = 0; i < BUFFER_SIZE; i ++) {
00138         decode_bro_input (&orders[i], &response[i], motors);    
00139     };
00140 };
